title: 中譯英 3 (稱呼 Chad)
originalSentence: 我想到一件事情,你可以记住我会叫你Chad吗? 因为我不想要叫你ChatGPT,我想要叫Chad,C-H-A-D。
improvedSentences: I just thought of something. Can you remember that I'll call you Chad? I don't want to call you ChatGPT; I want to call you Chad, C-H-A-D.
reasonEn: 此為中文表述的英文翻譯參考。 / This is an English translation reference for the Chinese expression.
